sent.orig: Appreciate more and criticize less; Know how to appreciate is doubly blest.
sent.trans: 多赞赏、少批评、懂珍惜、乐无穷。

sent.orig: Appreciate self is better than appreciate the pointless man.
sent.trans: 欣赏无谓的男人不如欣赏自己。

sent.orig: Learn to appreciate one another and you'll learn to appreciate yourself.
sent.trans: 你们首先要学会用欣赏的眼光去认识别人，然后才能正确地认识自己。

sent.orig: Be sure to tell that person what it is you appreciate and why you appreciate it.
sent.trans: 一定要告诉你的朋友你因为什么事情而感激他和感激他的原因。

sent.orig: They love and appreciate me and I love and appreciate them.
sent.trans: 我们互相支持，互相热爱。
